verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou shalt hearken diligently <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> thee on high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee, if <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground, <S%H127><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy store. <S%H4863><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be when thou comest in, <S%H935><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be when thou goest out. <S%H3318><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before thy face: <S%H6440><s%> they shall come out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H413><s%> thee one <S%H259><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways. <S%H1870><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon <S%H854><s%> thee in thy storehouses, <S%H618><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> that thou settest <S%H4916><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto; and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall establish <S%H6965><s%> thee a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, as <S%H834><s%> he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thee, if <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou art called <S%H7121><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in goods, <S%H2896><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground, <S%H127><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall open <S%H6605><s%> unto thee <S%H853><s%> his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure, <S%H214><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> unto thy land <S%H776><s%> in his season, <S%H6256><s%> and to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hand: <S%H3027><s%> and thou shalt lend <S%H3867><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> borrow. <S%H3867><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> thee the head, <S%H7218><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> the tail; <S%H2180><s%> and thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> only, <S%H7535><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> beneath; <S%H4295><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> that thou hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> them:

And thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> go aside <S%H5493><s%> from any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> to the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them.

But it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day; <S%H3117><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee:
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be in the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy store. <S%H4863><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land, <S%H127><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be when thou comest in, <S%H935><s%> and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> be when thou goest out. <S%H3318><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> upon thee <S%H853><s%> cursing, <S%H3994><s%> <S%H853><s%> vexation, <S%H4103><s%> and rebuke, <S%H4045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that thou settest <S%H4916><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto for <S%H834><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> thou be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> and until <S%H5704><s%> thou perish <S%H6><s%> quickly; <S%H4118><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of thy doings, <S%H4611><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> thou hast forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H853><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto thee, until <S%H5704><s%> he have consumed <S%H3615><s%> thee from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H127><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with a consumption, <S%H7829><s%> and with a fever, <S%H6920><s%> and with an inflammation, <S%H1816><s%> and with an extreme burning, <S%H2746><s%> and with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and with blasting, <S%H7711><s%> and with mildew; <S%H3420><s%> and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee until <S%H5704><s%> thou perish. <S%H6><s%>

And thy heaven <S%H8064><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> thy head <S%H7218><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> thee shall be iron. <S%H1270><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust: <S%H6083><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall it come down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, until <S%H5704><s%> thou be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine enemies: <S%H341><s%> thou shalt go out <S%H3318><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against <S%H413><s%> them, and flee <S%H5127><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them: and shalt be <S%H1961><s%> removed <S%H2189><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And thy carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> meat <S%H3978><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and unto the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and no man <S%H369><s%> shall frighten them away. <S%H2729><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with the botch <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and with the emerods, <S%H6076><s%> and with the scab, <S%H1618><s%> and with the itch, <S%H2775><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> be healed. <S%H7495><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with madness, <S%H7697><s%> and blindness, <S%H5788><s%> and astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart: <S%H3824><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1961><s%> grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday, <S%H6672><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropeth <S%H4959><s%> in darkness, <S%H653><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H853><s%> in thy ways: <S%H1870><s%> and thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> only <S%H389><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and spoiled <S%H1497><s%> evermore, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> and no man <S%H369><s%> shall save <S%H3467><s%> thee.

Thou shalt betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie with <S%H7901><s%> her: thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> a house, <S%H1004><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: thou shalt plant <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and shalt not <S%H3808><s%> gather the grapes <S%H2490><s%> thereof.

Thine ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: <S%H4480><s%> thine ass <S%H2543><s%> shall be violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> from before thy face, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> be restored <S%H7725><s%> to thee: thy sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and thou shalt have none <S%H369><s%> to rescue <S%H3467><s%> them.

Thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto another <S%H312><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and fail <S%H3616><s%> with longing for <S%H413><s%> them all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long: and there shall be no <S%H369><s%> might <S%H410><s%> in thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land, <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy labors, <S%H3018><s%> shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> eat up; <S%H398><s%> and thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> always: <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
So that thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4758><s%> of thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt see. <S%H7200><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee in <S%H5921><s%> the knees, <S%H1290><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> the legs, <S%H7785><s%> with a sore <S%H7451><s%> botch <S%H7822><s%> that <S%H834><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be healed, <S%H7495><s%> from the sole <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of thy foot <S%H7272><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the top of thy head. <S%H6936><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H1980><s%> thee, and thy king <S%H4428><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt set <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee, unto <S%H413><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> nor thy fathers <S%H1><s%> have known; <S%H3045><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

And thou shalt become <S%H1961><s%> an astonishment, <S%H8047><s%> a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and a byword, <S%H8148><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H5971><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> thee.

Thou shalt carry much seed out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H7227><s%> <S%H2233><s%> into the field, <S%H7704><s%> and shalt gather but little in; <S%H622><s%> <S%H4592><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume <S%H2628><s%> it.

Thou shalt plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and dress <S%H5647><s%> them, but shalt neither <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the wine, <S%H3196><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> gather <S%H103><s%> the grapes; for <S%H3588><s%> the worms <S%H8438><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> them.

Thou shalt have <S%H1961><s%> olive trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> thy coasts, <S%H1366><s%> but thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> anoint <S%H5480><s%> thyself with the oil; <S%H8081><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thine olive <S%H2132><s%> shall cast <S%H5394><s%> his fruit.

Thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> enjoy <S%H1961><s%> them; for <S%H3588><s%> they shall go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> thy trees <S%H6086><s%> and fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> consume. <S%H3423><s%>

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is within <S%H7130><s%> thee shall get up <S%H5927><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> thee very high; <S%H4605><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt come down <S%H3381><s%> very low. <S%H4295><s%> <S%H4295><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to thee, and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> lend <S%H3867><s%> to him: he <S%H1931><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt be <S%H1961><s%> the tail. <S%H2180><s%>

Moreover all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee, till <S%H5704><s%> thou be destroyed; <S%H8045><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou hearkenedst <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee:
And they shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon thee for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder, <S%H4159><s%> and upon thy seed <S%H2233><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou servedst <S%H5647><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness, <S%H8057><s%> and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%> for the abundance <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things;

Therefore shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against thee, in hunger, <S%H7458><s%> and in thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and in nakedness, <S%H5903><s%> and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things: and he shall put <S%H5414><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy neck, <S%H6677><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> thee.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee from far, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> from the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> as swift as <S%H834><s%> the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flieth; <S%H1675><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> understand; <S%H8085><s%>
